chargeHist.descr: Take and Drive Vehicle w/o Consent
Take and Drive Vehicle w/o Consent

result.execSummary:
The defendant Samuel Elliot John was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Drive or Operate w/o Consent-Abandon Veh, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 943.23(3m).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes: Maintain fulltime employment/schooling/combination of the 2 or if not, perform 10 hours community service per week.

Assessment/counseling/treatment as deemed appropriate by the agent.
Pay restitution in an amount to be determined at restitution hearing.
Court finds defendent eligible to petition for expungement if he successfully completes probation and restitution as determined is paid in full.
Court authorizes transfer of probation to defendant's county of residence. 
*AMENDED: Court amends JOC to reflect 40 days of sentence credit. 

If probation is revoked or discharged with outstanding financial obligations, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant in favor of restitution victims and/or governmental entities for the balance due.  All available enforcement actions will be used to collect the debt.  

A copy of the police report has been faxed to the probation office.

Argument.

subpoena mailed to C.M.K. 8/27/14
w/Notice of Right to Seek Postconviction Relief
C.M.K.

Clerk Marisa.
Case Called: 10:16 am 
State appears by ADA Chad Minder; Def appears in person with Atty Austin Mort.   
Plea Quest/Waiver of Rights filed. VRCW. 

State moves to: 
Ct. 1 (Take and Drive and Vehicle without Consent)>>AMEND TO Misd. Operating without Owner's Consent pursuant to 943.23(3m). 
COURT grants above. 

PLEA: Amended Ct. 1 (Misd. Operating without Owner's Consent)>>NO CONTEST. 

COURT advises def of rights (including constitutional rights) & penalties & ques def to understanding.  
COURT finds plea & waiver of rights freely & vol made, a factual basis, & def guilty. 
Def makes statement. 

COURT ORDERS: SWH for 1 year probation - CONDITIONS: assessment/counseling/treatment as deemed appropriate by the agent; no contact with C.K.; pay restitution in an amount to be determined at restitution hearing; maintain fulltime employment/schooling/combination of the 2 or if not, perform 10 hours community service per week; payment of court costs. 
COURT finds def eligible to petition for expungement if he successfully completes probation and restitution as determined is paid in full. 
State notes parties will be investigating matter of jail credit and will provide a stipulation to the court. 
COURT notes JOC will at this time reflect NO days jail credit and that can be amended if a stipulation is reached. 
COURT advises parties to set restitution hearing as soon as possible. 
COURT authorizes transfer of probation to def's county of residence. 
Adj: 10:29 am
